title: Bahama Mama
lyrics: Ba hama, bahama mama Got the biggest house in town bahama mama Ba hama, bahama mama But her troubles getting down bahama mama She has six daughters And not one of them is married yet And shes looking high and low And none of them plays ever hard to get So if youre lonesome go there go Ba hama, bahama mama You should all be looking for bahama mama Ba hama, bahama mama And I’m sure you will adore bahama mama Ba hama, bahama mama Got the biggest house in town bahama mama Bahama, bahama mama But her troubles getting down bahama mama Youll meet her daughters They’ll be treatin you to honeycake Theyll be sweet and nice to you And maybe there is one youd like to take Well then youll know just what to do Ba hama, bahama mama She is really in a fix bahama mama Bahama, bahama mama Being stuck with all them six bahama mama. Ba hama, bahama mama Got the biggest house in town bahama mama Bahama, bahama mama But her troubles getting down bahama mama The thing is each of them looks Like a gorgeous moviequeen Every one a perfect find And if a man refused that temptin scene He simply cant make up his mind. Ba hama, bahama mama You should all be looking for bahama mama Bahama, bahama mama And Im sure you will adore bahama mama.
